mapper.sql: id,userId,classifyCode, sourceId, sourceType, createTime, updateAdmin, updateTime,status
mapper.select: SELECT t.*,t_user.nickname as username,t_classify.classifyName, IF(t1.title IS NULL, t2.answer, CONCAT(t1.title,t1.detail)) content FROM bb_question_sys_block t LEFT JOIN bb_question t1 ON (t.sourceId=t1.id AND t.sourceType = 'question') LEFT JOIN bb_question_answer t2 ON (t.sourceId=t2.id AND (t.sourceType = 'answer' OR t.sourceType='comment')) LEFT JOIN abc12366_uc.uc_user t_user ON t.userId = t_user.id LEFT JOIN bb_question_classify t_classify ON t.classifyCode = t_classify.classifyCode
